version.name: 0.21-beta
version.author: Mantrika Sound
version.changelog:
v0.21-beta Changelogï¼š
+ Folder Actions Update: All actions affecting Folders now actively trigger Mirroring and Auto-Track Color logic. + Sample Broker: Optimized the Pool interaction logic with the Ling Sampler. + Render Queue: Fine-tuned MP4 format details and implemented clamping for AAC audio bitrate (kbps) settings. Added a shortcut to Enable/Disable the Queue by double-clicking the TabBar. + Ling Sampler: Added Envelope curves based on relative time.
-- Mantrika Team --2026.02.09
